Explanation: Find data where entity status category is ‘Small’.
Search data where application type label is either ‘Design’ or ‘Plant’.
Search data where applicationTypeLabelName is ‘Design’ OR businessEntityStatusCategory is ‘Micro’.
Search data where applicationStatusDescriptionText is ‘Patented Case’ AND businessEntityStatusCategory is ‘Micro’.
Search data where examinerNameText matches ‘ANDERS?N’ where ? can be replaced with any single character.
Search data where applicationStatusDate is greater than or equal to 2024-02-20.
Search data where applicationConfirmationNumber is between 2700 and 2710.
Search data where filingDate is from 2024-01-01 to 2024-08-30.
